description:

description:

title: Marvel Releases First Trailer For ‘Ironheart’

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
It may be surprising to learn that an alligator lived a better Hollywood career than some people. This was the case with Morris the Alligator who starred in a variety of films including Alligator and Happy Gilmore. Sadly, it’s been confirmed that Morris has died. The exact age of the alligator is unconfirmed, though he’s [...]

title: Morris The Alligator From ‘Happy Gilmore’ Dead At Over 80 Years Old
